articles.title: CBI arrests Avinash Bhosale in Yes Bank-DHFL scam case
articles.description: The CBI on Thursday arrested Avinash Bhosale, chairman of Pune-based real estate group ABIL group, in an alleged corruption case involving Yes Bank founder Rana Kapoor and Kapil Vadhawan of DHFL, officials said.
